prism

Class PrismFileLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismLog
      • prism.PrismFileLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PrismFileLog
extends PrismLog
    PrismLog object that writes all output to a file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String filename
      Filename (or "stdout")
      protected long fp
      Native file pointer, cast to a long
      protected boolean stdout
      Are we writing to stdout?

      • Fields inherited from class prism.PrismLog

        numberOfWarnings, verbosityLevel, VL_ALL, VL_DEFAULT, VL_HIGH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrismFileLog()
      Pointless constructor.
      PrismFileLog(java.lang.String filename)
      Create a PRISM log which will write to filename, overwriting any previous contents.
      PrismFileLog(java.lang.String filename, boolean append)
      Create a PRISM log which will write to filename, appending to an existing file if requested.

      • PrismFileLog

        public PrismFileLog(java.lang.String filename,
                    boolean append)
        Create a PRISM log which will write to filename, appending to an existing file if requested.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of log file
        append - Append to the existing file?

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static PrismFileLog create(java.lang.String filename)
                           throws PrismException
        Create a PRISM log which will write to filename, overwriting any previous contents. Throw a PRISM exception if there is a problem opening the file for writing.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of log file
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • create

        public static PrismFileLog create(java.lang.String filename,
                                  boolean append)
                           throws PrismException
        Create a PRISM log which will write to filename, appending to an existing file if requested. Throw a PRISM exception if there is a problem opening the file for writing.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of log file
        append - Append to the existing file?
        Throws:
        PrismException
